screenshots.caption: Total Testing Tool as a middle-ware

name: Total Testing Tool
short_description:
TechTLabs has developed an innovative JAVA based application Total Testing Tool (T3), with this tool you can test any client – server based application. T3 is easy to install and use application. T3 can be used from command line as well from its GUI. So a tester can get a flexibility to perform a test.
T3 is a platform independent application. It can be used on Windows, Linux, or Solaris. With this tool you can test multiple protocols at same time. T3 uses XML as an input file that means to write test scripts in T3 there is no additional complex programming knowledge. The test script written for Windows instance can be used for Linux instances of T3.
Sound features of Total Testing Tool:

    Developed in JAVA
    T3 and its scripts can be used on any OS like windows, Linux, or Solaris.
    All Protocols, Simulators in T3 has been developed based on Industry standards and RFCs.
    T3 can act as a test tool or as a simulator at a same time.
